author: amaltaro
body:
This is a work in progress PR.

It builds a new `wmagentpy3` spec file, based on the python3 stack library.

First commit builds wmagentpy3 with the first set of dependencies, such as (rucio-clients brings tons of dependencies though):
```
Requires: yui libuuid couchdb15 condor pystack jemalloc cmsmonitoring dbs3-client
Requires: python3 py3-sqlalchemy py3-httplib2 py3-pycurl py3-rucio-clients
```
title: Build WMAgent with a python3 stack
